title: BRIEF-Rea Group Says Co Entered Into Binding Agreement To Establish JV With 99.Co
text:
BRIEF-Rea Group Says Co Entered Into Binding Agreement To Establish JV With 99.Co

Stock Markets 2 hours ago (Oct 08, 2019 18:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Rea Group Says Co Entered Into Binding Agreement To Establish JV With 99.Co Oct 8 (Reuters) - REA Group Ltd : * CO ENTERED INTO BINDING AGREEMENT TO ESTABLISH A JOINT VENTURE WITH 99.CO * REA GROUP WILL BE THE LARGEST SHAREHOLDER WITH A 27% SHAREHOLDING * TO CONTRIBUTE $8 MILLION IN WORKING CAPITAL TO JV * EXISTING 99.CO SHAREHOLDERS, LIKE SEQUOIA, EDUARDO SAVERIN, AND SO ON WILL HAVE SHAREHOLDINGS IN JV CO TOTALLING 73%

BRIEF-Rea Group Says Co Entered Into Binding Agreement To Establish JV With 99.Co
description: BRIEF-Rea Group Says Co Entered Into Binding Agreement To Establish JV With 99.Co
